mapper.select: SELECT log_tm AS logTm, device_id AS deviceId, log_type AS logType, req_url AS reqUrl, page_url AS pageUrl, user_id AS userId, res_msg AS resMsg, coalesce(intervaltime, 0) AS intervaltime, coalesce(download_time, 0) AS downloadTime, coalesce(wait_time, 0) AS waitTime, response_size AS responseSize, request_size AS requestSize, webview_ver AS webviewVer, app_build_num AS appBuildNum, storage_total AS storageTotal, storage_usage AS storageUsage, battery_lvl AS batteryLvl, mem_usage AS memUsage, cpu_usage AS cpuUsage, com_sensitivity AS comSensitivity, com_type AS comType, sim_operator_nm AS simOperatorNm, os_type AS osType, app_ver AS appVer, timezone AS timezone, ip AS ip, status_code AS statusCode FROM maxy_app_total_log WHERE device_id = %(device_id)s AND log_tm = %(log_tm)s ORDER BY reg_dt DESC LIMIT 1
